name: D'Lecia Ha Long Hotel
address: No.38 Tan Mai Street, Dong Hung Thang, Hạ Long, Việt Nam
description:
D'Lecia Ha Long Hotel có hồ bơi ngoài trời, phòng chờ chung, nhà hàng và quầy bar ở Hạ Long. Chỗ nghỉ cách Bãi biển Marina Bay khoảng 1.8 km, Bãi Cháy 2.2 km và Cáp treo Nữ Hoàng 4.1 km. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng được trang bị điều hòa có bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, tủ lạnh, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh. Tại D'Lecia Ha Long Hotel, các phòng đều có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Chỗ nghỉ có phục vụ bữa sáng thực đơn buffet hoặc kiểu Á.

Đi xe đạp là hoạt động được ưa chuộng trong khu vực. Ngoài ra, khách sạn 4 sao này có dịch vụ thuê ô tô.

D'Lecia Ha Long Hotel cách Cảng Tuần Châu 9.2 km và Trung tâm thương mại Vincom Hạ Long 11 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Cát Bi, cách khách sạn 40 km.

review.rating: A comfortable stay, but the receptionist might have tried to scam us.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: The room was large and has a nice view of the surrounding area. And the pool area is quite nice, when it is not filled with children, as it was most of the time.
review.comment_negative:
There was two incidents that broke my regard for this hotel. 

The hotel has a roomservice menu that on the surface looks very good. So for one of the nights we decided to order a pizza from it. When it arrived at our room we almost had to laugh. At the price of ten dollars it was laughably small and tasted like came straight from the fridge. I could have bought a better frozen pizza at any grocery store in the US for a $1.50. 

 The other incident was one that I can't tell if was a scam attempt or just plain staff incompetence. When we were leaving to go back to Hanoi airport we thought we would use the hotels provided airport shuttle. In the brosjure in our room it is stated to cost 1.8 million dong (80-90$). When we enquire about this service at the reception the morning before our last night the receptionist tells us that they do not offer it anymore, but that she could get us an airport transfer for 2 - 2.2 million dong. Disappointed we decide to leave it at that before heading out to enjoy our day. Later that evening I go back to enquire again, this time to a different receptionist, and she offers me the airport shuttle for the previously stated 1.8 million without any trouble. 

Except for these to incidents our stay was quite comfortable, but in a country riddled with taxi scams this makes me feel I can't give them the benefit of the doubt and must leave them with this bad review.

review.rating: Really loud construction, difficult to obtain refund
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: It was clean - staff generally polite and professional, good pool and sauna. building inside was nice.
review.comment_negative:
I had issues from the start where I originally had booked a longer stay - I changed my booking before the booking.com cut off to a shorter stay of 2 nights as on arrival I realised it was in an incredibly loud place, with heavy traffic and construction going on. 

Despite being within the Booking.com timeframe for cancellation/ changes they made it very difficult to get a refund, first refusing, then saying that they could but it would take 2 months to go into my account (where I was doubtful it would ever get there…) eventually after a day they agreed to refund in cash but deducted 10% for ‘taxes’ because it was cash - which I don’t really 100% think is legal or correct but I just really wanted to get some kind of refund back. 

Though I lost money (and will be querying this with Booking.com) I’m really glad I changed hotels as it was pretty difficult to rest in my room or sleep past 7am with incredibly loud drilling and construction noises the time I stayed there. Not for light sleepers or for anybody who will want to spend much time in their room.

The room was dirty which the staff did accommodate and slow us to change rooms but not much better. The breakfast is awful, if you are not the first there you are left with everyone’s left overs, no vegetarian option apart from toast. The location is far from ideal, no views of the bay and too far to walk to the main part with very few taxis around the hotel was hard to get around, they would call taxis for you however but we got scammed a couple of times by the taxi drivers. The room service shut early without warning to the guests so when we arrived back from our tour we had no food available. Ultimately not worth the money!

review.rating: Sehr günstiges Hotel mit viel Luxus; nicht ganz zentral
review.room_type: Phòng Grand Deluxe có Giường cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel bietet viel Luxus für kleines Geld! 

Ich hatte einen Grand Deluxe Room mit 30 qm gebucht, welcher farblich sehr harmonisch mit edlen Materialien ausgestattet war. Das Bett war äußerst bequem. Fenster (sogar im 11. Stockwerk) konnte man auf Kipp stellen und somit gut lüften. 
Das Bad war freundlich und luxuriös und hell eingerichtet. 

Das Personal war freundlich und hilfsbereit. Die meisten sprachen gutes Englisch, sodaß die Verständigung kein Problem darstellte.  

Das Frühstücksbuffet war sehr umfangreich und frisch und optisch sehr schön in tollem Ambiente dargeboten. Pho Suppen und Eierspeisen konnte man sich individuell zubereiten und an den Tisch bringen lassen. Toll!  

Der Laundry Service funktionierte schnell, zuverlässig und sehr günstig!

Das Internet lief rasend schnell und komplett ohne irgendeinen Aussetzer!
review.comment_negative: Leider bot das Hotel kein Room Service Menu an, von dem ich gerne Gebrauch gemacht hätte.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Довольно таки обычный отель и спокойный. Уютный бассейн, но сауна платная. Персонал отзывчивый.
review.comment_negative: Со мной в первый раз такое случилось. Выселение было рано утром, посчитали много позиций в мини баре, которые я не трогала. Пришлось пол часа разбираться, а уже нужно было ехать в аэропорт. Завтрак очень скудный. В прайсе в номере отеля было написано такси до аэропорта 750.000. Мне по факту говорят 900.000. Ну это нормально для Халонга, такое завышение цены туристу.

review.rating: A little gem of a hotel in a big city
review.room_type: Phòng Premier Deluxe có giường cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Beautiful hotel: room very spacious and one of the most comfortable beds we’ve ever tried! 
Unfortunately, we could stay only one night and in winter season so the city was a bit deserted and we couldn’t experience Ha Long and this stunning hotel in full.
Breakfast offer was rich with a nice selection of fruits, sweets and other complements. There is a chef who cooks your eggs a la minute.
The property features a nice outdoor swimming pool on the 4th floor. 
Staff is very polite and welcoming.

review.rating: A generally modern & spacious hotel that well renovated
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: The room is spacious, modern & clean. The hotel is located in a quiet part of the town, & next street (a minute walk) is the busy Ha Long road with the shops but not all are for shopping. A 5-minute walk bring me to the busy market & more eateries for local. Nguyen Siew May at the front desk, was very helpful to provide guidance on where to eat or shop. She able to speak Chinese to interact well
review.comment_negative: There was renovation drilling work early 6am. Because of lack of occupant, half of the main lobby’s light was not switched on. At my floor, the lift lobby light activated by motion sensor, so it was quite a scare when the door of lift open to a dark space. There were some bed bugs that I feedback to the Reception.

Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Het personeel was vriendelijk. Kamers waren ruim. Het hotel ligt wat verderaf van het centrum. 300 mtr de straat uit lopen brengt je bij veel winkels en restaurants.
review.comment_negative:
Dit hotel gaf hoge verwachtingen. Wij hadden twee Deluxe tweepersoonskamers geboekt. In allebei de kamers werkte de koelkast niet en op één kamer (1006) was het toilet smerig. Rest was zeer schoon. Airco ‘s nachts uitgezet want je kon de luchtstroom niet regelen en deze blaasde in de laagste stand over de hoofdeinden. We kregen een nieuwe kamer en op de andere werd de koelkast vervangen.

Het ontbijt is Aziatisch en Continentaal. Echter alleen croissants, wit brood (om te roosteren) en stokbrood met jam en honing. Geen kaas of vleesbeleg. Wel gebakken eieren (vooraf gebakken dus koud) en op verzoek maakten ze een gebakken ei naar keuze met al dan niet groenten. Ook was er een worstje maar geen spek.

Bij betaling met creditcard betaald je 3% extra.

Er worden twee excursies boottochten Ha Long Bay aangeboden. Deze worden uitgevoerd door Ha binh 58. Eentje van zes (vnd 900.000) en drie uur (vnd 800.000) inclusief transfer van/naar hotel. Deze moet je contant afrekenen. 
De boottocht van zes uur was bedrog. Ze sloegen twee eilanden over.
We waren na vijf uur terug met de terugvaart in slakkengang. Dit is overigens niet het hotel aan te rekenen.

Bij het afrekenen met creditcard wordt 3% extra kosten in rekening gebracht.

review.comment_positive: This was one of the best hotels I've ever stayed at. The building is beautiful and impeccably designed. The room was very comfortable with a great view of the city. Breakfast was cooked to order and rich and tasty.
review.comment_negative: When I checked in they told me that the credit card reader wasn't working so I had to go withdraw cash to pay for the room. On the street behind the hotel there were a ton of banks and ATMs but almost all of them didn't take foreign debit cards (believe me, I tried them all). The only one that worked was the very last bank on that street, at the intersection of Ha Long and Phan Boi Chau.

It’s the best hotel and staffs since I visited the Northern Vietnam.

review.comment_negative: J’avais choisi cet hôtel principalement pour sa piscine, malheureusement celle-ci n’a pas l’air chauffée et l’eau est beaucoup trop froide pour pouvoir se baigner. J’ai voulu me rabattre sur le sauna mais celui-ci n’est pas inclus et le tarif est exorbitant (même en Europe je paie moins cher). il n’y avait d’ailleurs personne ni à la piscine ni au sauna. Dommage car sans ça, ce séjour aurait pu être parfait.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Tolles modernes Hotel mit schöner Ausstattung. Das ganze Hotel war sehr sauber. Das Frühstücksbuffet war sehr reichhaltig - hier ist für jeden Geschmack etwas zu finden. 
Das Personal ist sehr zuvorkommend und kümmert sich engagiert um alle Wünsche der Besucher. 
Die im Hotel gebuchte Tagestour war sehr schön und dem Preis angemessen. 
Auch das Buchen der Weiterfahrt war mit Hilfe des Personals ohne Probleme möglich. 

Leider gibt es in der nähren Umgebung nur wenig Möglichkeiten etwas vegetarisches zu essen. Das Restaurant im Hotel bietet hier aber sehr gute und bezahlbare Gerichte an.
review.comment_negative: Leider ist die Lage nicht so gut wie das Hotel.

Nhờ lễ tân gọi taxi ra bến tàu. Từ Khách sạn đến bến tàu 1 xe 7 chỗ và 1 xe 4 chỗ tính 500k. Tài xế không tính theo công tơ mét mà tự tính giá. Gia đình mình phản đối thì bảo đồ nhiều, chúng mình cự lại thì bảo đưa 400k cũng được. 
Lưu ý cho anh chị em nên hỏi giá trước khi đi xe thì nên thương lượng giá trước. 
Mình cứ đinh ninh nhờ khách sạn đặt giúp thì sẽ liên hệ 1 đơn vị uy tín nhưng điều đó không xảy ra nha quý vị.
Khách sạn mà hợp tác với với mấy bác tài kiểu này thì coi như tự hại danh tiếng của mình

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Liked everything. The process of check in was smooth. The front office staff was amazing
 Speciall Mr Pham Quang Huy. He was the front office manager, he was soo cooperative in understanding all our requirements being pure vegetarian and ensured all was served as discussed 

Another staff member Ms Linh ( i may have spelled wrong) but she was excellent with her English and making us feel soo comfortable all the while in the restaurant.

The room was super luxurious, clean and well maintained. There was no room for complain. The bed was extra large double bed, easily sleeps 3 ppl.

As there was less occupancy, they had no buffet served, but Ms Linh ensured our requirements were served on the table. 

The chef was excellent with preparing those Fried noodles and Salad bowls. 

Everyone went out of the way when it came to serve us.  Definitely will recommend everyone to stay here. You have Tokyo life a brand showroom for amazing shopping next door. 

Bike rentals and tours can easily be arranged by their desk. And even the transfers they did at an excellent price.

review.rating: Amazing staff and comfortable hotel that was great value for money.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
- Staff made it by going above and beyond throughout our 1 night stay. Although the stay was short, the front office manager (Pham Quang Huy) made us feel so 
welcome from the start. We had a Ha long Bay cruise booked the following day with no transfer to Hanoi the day after but he called over a colleague who 
arranged a low cost limousine for us, contacting us and keeping us updated so well whilst on the cruise to put our minds at ease. 
- Breakfast was great, fresh omelettes and pho made in front of you with a wide selection of breakfast items (I wish I was there more days to try it all).
- Bed was comfy and room was very nice and luxurious.
- Location was good, within walking distance of shops and restaurants.
- Good amenities such as robe and scales.
- Amazing value for money.

review.rating: Nice hotel but location was challenging.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is beautiful and the room was spacious, clean and comfortable. 
Huin organised a day cruise for us and was super helpful and spoke excellent English but she seemed to be the only one. 
The pool area is really nice and it’s good that you can order drinks and food to be served here.
review.comment_negative:
We had difficulty communicating in English with the majority of staff. The hotel was quiet when we stayed and so the breakfast buffet was nothing like what was pictured on here. You couldn’t order food to eat in the bar area so had to order room service and eat in your room. 
The location didn’t seem to have any other western tourists during our stay in November, which wouldn’t normally be an issue but there didn’t seem to be much to do as a result.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn

review.comment_positive: Das Hotel hat ein ausgesprochen gutes Preis-Leistungsverhältnis. Unsere Zimmer (Superior mit Kingsize-Bett) waren neuwertig, ohne gebrauchsspuren, extrem sauber, groß und modern ausgestattet (u.a. Hans Grohe Dusche, Holz und Marmor-Böden). Alles ist hochwertig verarbeitet und der Pool wird ohne Zusätze, wie Chlor,  sehr sauber gehalten. Das Früstücksbuffet ist ausreichend und das Speisen des Hausrestaurants sind mit liebe zubereitet und sehr lecker. Das Personal ist freundlich. Das Hotel hat zurecht sehr gute Bewertungen bekommen. Meine Bewertung ist nicht - wie leider oft erlebt - auf eine nahegelegte Anregung des Personals erfolgt, sondern als eine Folge des wunderschönen Aufenthalts im Hotel.

review.comment_positive: This hotel is gorgeous!! It's amazing value for money and our room was just as pictured. It was the best shower we had during our stay in Vietnam. The staff were lovely and super accommodating to all our requests. As for the location, it's central to popular cafes and restaurants, and a 15 min walk to the night markets. As many others have mentioned in other reviews, it's truly bizarre that this is only a 3 star hotel (must be due to lack of a pool or gym) as it is such a luxurious place!!

review.comment_positive: Es war ein wunderbarer Aufenthalt. Das Personal ist ausgesprochen freundlich und immer super bemüht, alle Wünsche der Gäste zu erfüllen. Alles ist sauber, geschmackvoll eingerichtet und funktioniert wie es soll. Da weder die Stadt noch das Hotel voll waren, war es zum Schlafen auch sehr schön leise. Sehr empfehlenswert ist auch die vom Hotel vermittelte Tagestour mit dem Boot durch die Ha Long-Bucht. Professionell und reibungslos mit Transfer zum und vom Hafen. Informationen auf Englisch. Toll.
review.comment_negative: Das einzige was noch zu verbessern gewesen wäre, ist, dass die Mitarbeiter mit Kundenkontakt ein bisschen mehr Englisch sprechen könnten.

review.comment_positive: The hotel is quite new; therefore, the facilities are great. The room is spacious and good value for money. The highlight of the stay is the staff. The girls at the reception Thuy, Mai and Nga gave us the absolute support and help whenever we asked for. Although the location is not nearby the beach, I would recommend this hotel as there are plenty of food and drink options nearby. Only five-minute drive/ ride to reach the tourist area, you got huge room, with good price and excellent staffs.
